name: Zarjaz
description:
Back of Case (from Ad Blurbs)

Fax McSheen blasts his way through space

A distant future date... a Zone of Space is discovered not obeying the normal laws of the Universe (tut!). Now you, as Fax McSheen, must investigate with your 3 attack Drones and destroy everything in your path - be it planet or alien... continued next week (or inside!).

Special Features
  • Fabby star effect!
  • 15 levels of intense-action!
  • Crazy flying skills needed!
  • Brilliant music!

releases.country: France, Germany, The Netherlands, United Kingdom
